document.discussion_title: Vijay Mallya to lose MP tag?
document.topic_text: You are here: Home » India Vijay Mallya to lose MP tag? Please enable the javascript of your browser to see the video. URL: Comment After his passport has been revoked, beleaguered businessman Vijay Mallya might also lost his MP tag after Rajya Sabha Ethics panel wants him out of the Parliament.
